19748.「なにぶん 昔のことだからねえ。\n こんなものしか なかったよ。:
The information you're looking for is from a 
long time ago. This is all I have about it.

19749.<pipipi_low>「首尾はどうかな <pc>くん？\n おっ 手がかりが:
<pipipi_low> How's it going <pc>?
Oh hey, looks like you found a clue!

19750.「これは 結婚式の出席者の 一覧だね。\n あれれ？ 私の おばあちゃんの名前が:
Hey this is a list of the wedding attendees.
Oh, look! My grandma's name is here. It's
on the bride's side?... is she related?

19751.「ああ～ そういえば 私の おばあちゃんと\n ダーリアさんは 姉妹だって話を\:
Oh yeah, come to think of it. I remember once
hearing about my grandma and Dahlia being
sisters...

19752.「あっ 名前の消されてる所がある！: Look, in this part they erased a name too!

19753.「これ やっぱり あの女の子かな？\n 確認してみたほうが よさそうだね。:
Is this the girl we're looking for? We should
verify by asking about it.

19754.「ラージャ神父。この出席者の一覧から\n 名前が消されている 村人がいます。\n:
Priest Roger. There's a villager whose name
has been erased from this list right here.
Is this a girl of... around 10 years old?

19756.「どうして 隠すんですか？\n それは もしかして……。: Why would you hide it? Could it be because...

19757.「その女の子が 死の言葉を使う\n 女の子だからですか？:
That girl is one of those people who used
the speech of death decades ago?

19758.「ル ルベカ！\n なぜ それを！？: Ru...Rubecca! Where did you learn about it!?

19759.「やっぱり そうなんだ……。\n じつは 私のアタマの中に その女の子の声……\:
I knew it... To tell the truth, I can hear
that girl's voice... filling my mind with
her speech of death.

19760.「……ああ なんということだ。\n 今になって そんなことが 起ころうとは……。:
... Unbelievable. I never thought something
like this would happen in this era...

19761.「我々は あの少女のことを 忘れようとした。 \n しかし それは 許されぬこと:
As much as we tried to forget about that girl.
We're not allowed to do it? Is it the will
of God that we must speak of it?

19762.「教えてくれますね？: Would you mind to share about it with us?

19763.「……わかった。\n 私が 先代より 聞かされた話を伝えよう。:
... Understood. I'll convey the story that
I've heard from my predecessors.

19764.「……昔。この村に 赤子が拾われてきた。\n 時が過ぎ 赤子は１０歳の少女へと成:
A long time ago. A baby was found and brought
to this village, as time passed, the baby
grew up to be a 10 years old girl.

19765.「ある日 少女が村人の名を呼び 死ぬと言った。\n 数日して その村人が事故で死:
One day, the girl called out the name of a
villager and said they would die. Few days
later, that villager died in an accident.

19766.「名前を呼ばれ 死んでいく村人は\n ひとり……また ひとりと増えていった。:
Time passed and one by one, more and more
villagers met their death after being called
out by their name.

19767.「村人たちは 恐れた。\n 次に 少女に名を呼ばれるのは\n 自分かもしれない…:
Filled with fear, the villagers were out of
control. Anyone could be the next target.

19768.「……そして レグとダーリアの結婚式を\n 間近に控えた ある日のことだ。\n:
... And then, on a certain day, close to
Reg and Dahlia's wedding, that girl...

19769.「ダーリアが死ぬ……と告げたのだ。: She said... Dahlia, you are next.

19770.「人々の恐れは 一気に 怒りへ変わった！\n 少女を捕らえた村人は むりやり薬を:
In a blink of an eye, people's fear turned 
into anger! The villagers grabbed the girl, 
and forced her to drink a Cursed Mixture!

19771.「声をうばわれた少女は その後\n 村人たちによって どこか遠い地に\n 閉じ込:
With her voice sealed thanks to the drink, the
girl was later imprisoned by the villagers 
to a faraway place.

19772.「だが……。結婚式の前の日。: But... The day before the wedding ceremony.

19773.「少女は 慰霊の浜に 姿を現した！\n そして 身を清めようと海に入った \n:
The girl appeared on Solace Beach! She rushed
into the sea to reach Dahlia, seeking for
purification...

19774.「ダーリアを 海に沈めたのだ。: Ending up drowning Dahlia in the process.

19775.「そんな……ダーリアさんは\n その女の子に 殺されたってこと？: So... Miss Dahlia was killed by that girl?

19776.「あの……。その子の名前は……？: Uhmm... And what about her name?

19777.「……それは 言えぬ。: I can't... I can't tell you.

19778.「その名を告げれば \n 私のアタマの中にも 死の言葉が\n ひびくことになるか:
If I were to reveal that name, the speech of
death may echo inside my head as well...

19779.「……なら せめて その子が\n 閉じ込められたっていう場所だけでも\n 教えて:
... If that's the case, could you at least 
tell me where do they sent her imprisoned?

19780.「コルット地方にある 浜辺の洞くつの奥だ……。\n 今はもう 誰かが いるはずも:
She was sent deep inside a Beach Cave in the
Colt Region... Though, I'm sure you won't
find anything in there anymore.

19781.「ダーリアさんは やっぱり\n 海で おぼれたんじゃ なかったんだね……。:
So, Dahlia's drowning into the sea wasn't an
act done by herself after all, huh...

19782.「だけど どうして？\n １０歳の女の子が どんな理由があって\n ダーリアさん:
But why? What possible reason would, a young
girl like her, have to kill Dahlia...?

19783.「私 もっと その女の子のことを知りたい。: I need to know more about the girl as well.

19784.「でも 今ある 手がかりは その子が\n 閉じ込められてたっていう洞くつだけよね:
But for now, the only clue we have is the cave
where she was imprisoned, right? Anyway, i
think I'll go there and see for myself.

19785.「コルット地方にある 浜辺の洞くつの奥よ。\n 私は ちょっと 家の掃除を頼まれ:
I'll go there after I'm done finishing some
cleaning tasks at home. Where was it? Deep
inside a Beach Cave in the Colt Region.

19786.「遅くなって ごめんね。\n テーブルの汚れが なかなか 取れなくて。:
Sorry for being late! I had trouble cleaning
all the stains from the table.

19787.「ちょっ……。なんで 魔物がいるの？\n このままじゃ 調べられないよ。:
Wait... There are monsters in here? We can't
investigate the place this way.

19788.「あっ そうだ。少女探偵ルベカちゃんには\n <cs_pchero>っていう 優:
But that shouldn't bother us because, me, Girl
Detective Rubecca~ has an amazing and super
strong assistant called <cs_pchero>!

19789.「じゃあ <cs_pchero> よろしくね！: Get rid of them, pretty please~

19791.「私は ここを どうしても調べたいの。\n 魔物を 片付けちゃってくれるかな？: The case needs to continue so, do your part!

19792.「じゃあ <cs_pchero> よろしくね！: Get rid of them, pretty please~

19793.「さすがだね <cs_pchero>。\n 頼りになる助手がいて 助かったわ。:
As expected from my assistant. I can always
count on you <cs_pchero>!

19794.「ラージャ神父の話が本当なら あの女の子は\n ここに 閉じ込められていたのね…:
If Priest Roger's story is true, that girl
must've been imprisoned here...

19795.「人がいた跡とか ないみたい。\n 手がかりは 何も残ってないのかな……。:
There doesn't seem to be any traces of anyone
being here. I wonder if there are any clues
left behind...

19799.「なんだろう？ よく わからないけど\n 何かを 感じるの……。:
I wonder what it could be? I don't know what
it is, but I can sense something...

19802.「聞こえたの！ あの女の子の声が……。\n まちがいないよ。聞いたことのある声だ:
I've heard it again! It's the voice of that
girl... There's no mistake, it's the same
one from before. And...

19803.「まさか……\n あれが あの子の名前だったなんて……。: I can't believe it... That's, her name...?

19805.「ラージャ神父の 言ったとおりよ。\n あの女の子は ここに\n 閉じ込められて:
As Priest Roger said, the girl was here,
they imprisoned her in this cave...

19806.「……なんだか とても 疲れちゃった。\n 今日は この辺で 終わりにしよう？:
...What's this, I feel really tired.
Shall we finish here for today?

19807.「<cs_pchero>だって 魔物と戦って \n きっと 疲れてるはずだよね。: You must be tired too, after all of that work.

19808.「一緒に 来てくれて ありがとう。\n ちゃんと お礼は 持ってきてあるんだ。\:
Once again, thanks so much for coming with me.
I brought a proper reward this time.
Please accept it!

19809.「それじゃ 私は レーンの村に帰るよ。\n 続きは 疲れが取れてからにしたいの。:
Well then, I'm going back to Lane Village.
Let's continue after I feel refreshed.

19810.「<cs_pchero>も ゆっくり 休んで。\n これからも 手伝ってもらうん:
Take your time and rest too, <cs_pchero>.
I'll continue relying on you from now on.
